title: 가정법+도치 ①
description: Had I known... 패턴으로 문장 시작. 예) Had I known, I would have acted differently. 완전히 숙달했는지 점검.
examples: Had I known, I would have acted differently.
Had we prepared better, the outcome would have been different.
Had they consulted us, this problem could have been avoided.
learning_points: Had 도치를 사용한 가정법 고급 표현

sentences.en: Had I known, I would have acted differently.

sentences.kr: 우리가 더 잘 준비했다면, 결과가 달랐을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had we prepared better, the outcome would have been different.

sentences.kr: 그들이 우리와 상담했다면, 이 문제는 피할 수 있었을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had they consulted us, this problem could have been avoided.

sentences.kr: 내가 더 주의 깊게 봤다면, 실수를 발견했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had I looked more carefully, I would have spotted the mistake.

sentences.kr: 우리가 더 빨리 시작했다면, 지금껏 완료했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had we started earlier, we would have finished by now.

sentences.kr: 그녀가 진실을 말했다면, 우리는 그녀를 도울 수 있었을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had she told the truth, we could have helped her.

sentences.kr: 날씨가 더 좋았다면, 야외 행사를 열었을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had the weather been better, we would have held the outdoor event.

sentences.kr: 내가 상황을 제대로 이해했다면, 다른 접근 방식을 사용했을 것입니다.
sentences.en: Had I understood the situation properly, I would have used a different approach.
